name: Free 1 Bit Pixel Art Forest
description:
An 16x16 tileset and a background of a forest in 1-bit that you can immediately use for your project with ease!

Features:

1 16x16 tileset

1 background with 5 layers

Some trees and bushes

Details:

PSD and PNG files.

Examples in PNG.

Everything in 1-bit (black and white)

Feel free to send me messages or leave a comment if you have questions or need more info. Enjoy!
